column6: "SINS PAST" PART 2 (OF 5) The second part of a Spider-Man arc that will have people talking for years.  Don't miss an issue, or you'll be sorry!  Featuring art by new series artist Mike Deodato - one more reason not to miss a single issue!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mike Deodato | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | inker:Jose Pimentel
